name: Another Day At The Office (MattHDev)
description:
It's another day at the office. You work at a nuclear power plant, your totally not at all dangerous and confusing job is to keep the reactor ticking over without causing a meltdown.

As an extra security measure, you have been bolted to your workstation for the duration of your shift, so you have no choice but to succeed otherwise there's no means of escape...quite an ethically ambigious motivation technique but it gets the job done.

Or does it?

[This game is a work in progress, I didn't get much time during the jam hours so an update to get it all working will hopefully follow]
